comment: Shayar sahab! Yaar kitni romantic shayari likhta h tu! But u are an amazing person. U and sanjay are my best friends on the campus. I hope we all three meet in the future. we spent a great time together yaar I'm gonna miss u yaar! Speacilly tumhari shayari shayar sahab ! All the best for ur future !
name: Sheetal
